Stability_AssetNotReviewed:

Stability_NotReviewed: This package has not been reviewed yet. The compatibility info may not be accurate.
Stability_Stable: This package is stable. It's author is still actively working on it and updating it.
Stability_StableNoNewFeatures:
This package is stable, though the author will no longer release feature updates.
They will however still update it in case of new bugs.
Stability_StableNoFutureUpdates: This package is stable, though the author is no longer supporting it, future updates or bug fixes are unlikely.
Stability_HasIssuesNoFutureUpdates: This package can cause issues, and the author is no longer supporting it, future updates or bug fixes are unlikely.
Stability_BreaksOnPatch: This package is very likely to break when the new patch is released.
Stability_NotEnoughInformation: There is not enough information to properly review this package.

It is known to either break the game or just does not work.

This package is not compatible with, or breaks, the game.

You should remove it immediately.
